help-file.title: "SENSE LIFE"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Divination
This spell will enable you to sense hidden life forms in a room. The caster will then be able to detect invisible or hiding creatures in a room, although, they will be unable to discern their true nature.
